Name: ReadyRoll - Deploy Database Package
Description:
Deploy database changes packaged with Redgate's [ReadyRoll](http://www.ready-roll.com/). Requires the Microsoft SQL Command Line Utilities 11 or later to be installed on the tentacle.

*Version date: 14th January, 2016*

Parameters.Name: PackageName
Parameters.Label: Package to deploy
Parameters.HelpText: The ID of the NuGet package you want to deploy. This matches the NuGet package ID from the NuSpec file in your ReadyRoll project.

Parameters.Name: DatabaseServer
Parameters.Label: Target SQL Server instance
Parameters.HelpText: The fully qualified SQL Server instance name for the target database.

Parameters.Name: DatabaseName
Parameters.Label: Target database name
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the database to deploy to. ReadyRoll will create a new database if it does not exist.

Parameters.Name: UseWindowsAuth
Parameters.Label: Use Windows Authentication
Parameters.HelpText: If you check this field, Windows authentication will be used to connect, using the account that runs the Tentacle service. Otherwise, SQL Server authentication will be used and you will need to specify a username and password below.

Parameters.Name: DatabaseUsername
Parameters.Label: Username
Parameters.HelpText: The SQL Server username used to connect to the database.

Parameters.Name: DatabasePassword
Parameters.Label: Password
Parameters.HelpText: The SQL Server password used to connect to the database.
